title: The Flowers
content:
The flowers you gave me last forever
Even on the spilled red side
You gave them to me again last night
Sacred, over and over. Don’t think
That I will ever lose you. Time is nothing.
Their petals ring like the fragile beat in my heart.
Don’t think that you live through me; it is the opposite climb:
I will meet you there as I do each moment of my life.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QdVr4R550ro
